```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
zip_file <- "flights.zip"
nome_arquivo_csv <- unzip(zip_file, list = TRUE)$Name[1]
start_time <- Sys.time()
dados_base <- read.csv(unz(zip_file, nome_arquivo_csv))
end_time <- Sys.time()
tempo_base <- end_time - start_time
print(paste("Tempo (base R):" , tempo_base))
```
